photos.title: Dam Reflection
photos.description: This is a view of a dam in Kleinmond. In this picture one can see the amazing view of the mountains and sky. The sky bounces off the water giving it a reflection effect. This is a peaceful and hidden place to have a swim.

photos.title: Jaguar E-Type 71'
photos.description: Jaguar E-Type next to a newly designed building with lots of colours that bring the image to life. The buildings in the background makes the car look extra special.

photos.title: Yellow Striped Frog
photos.description: This picture has a very detailed image of a frog. The frog is sitting on a lily enjoying the sun. One can see the water edging on the lily giving the picture move detail.

photos.title: Young married couple soul gazing
photos.description: This picture displays beautiful lighting with the sun shining over the mountain and water filling most of the image. This portrait has a bokah effect around the couple.

photos.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
photos.description: Fleeing the evil Galactic Empire, the Rebels abandon their new base in an assault with the Imperial AT-AT walkers on the ice world of Hoth. Princess Leia, Han Solo, Chewbacca and the droid C-3PO escape in the Millennium Falcon, but are later captured by Darth Vader on Bespin. Meanwhile, Luke Skywalker and the droid R2-D2 follows Obi-Wan Kenobi's posthumous command, and receives Jedi training from Master Yoda on the swamp world of Dagobah. Will Skywalker manage to rescue his friends from the Dark Lord?

photos.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
photos.description: Darth Vader and the Empire are building a new, indestructible Death Star. Meanwhile, Han Solo has been imprisoned, and Luke Skywalker has sent R2-D2 and C-3PO to try and free him. Princess Leia - disguised as a bounty hunter - and Chewbacca go along as well. The final battle takes place on the moon of Endor, with its natural inhabitants, the Ewoks, lending a hand to the Rebels. Will Darth Vader and the Dark Side overcome the Rebels and take over the universe?
